channel.title: Foliant Releases History
channel.description: Releases of Foliant documentation authoring tool and its extensions.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.15
item.description:
• New: [experimental] tags are now not necessary for tags, they are escaped automatically.
  • New: supply images with additional parameters using tag.
  • New: parameter.

item.title: foliantcontrib.templateparser 1.0.5
item.description:
• Config, backend name and target are now available under , and variables.
  • All the above variables along with and are now moved from into variable.
  • Fix: external context was overriding meta variables.

item.title: foliantcontrib.replace 1.0.5
item.description: • Bug fixed with several replaceable items in one string.

item.title: foliantcontrib.superlinks 1.0.9
item.description:
• Fix: BOF anchors bug
  • Fix: common paths processing

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.header_anchors 1.0.3
item.description: • Add IDGenerator class.

item.title: foliantcontrib.customids 1.0.7
item.description: • Styles are now inserted after YAML Front Matter if that is present.

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.preprocessor_ext 1.0.5
item.description: • Fix: allow_fail decorator now works for any function with any set of parameters.

item.title: foliantcontrib.plantuml 1.0.7
item.description:
• Config options now can be overriden in tag options.
  • Add option, which allows (when ) to insert svg-code instead of image into the document.

item.title: foliantcontrib.dbdoc 0.1.5
item.description: • New: trusted_connection option for Microsoft SQL Server

item.title: foliantcontrib.apilinks 1.2.2
item.description:
• Fix: Endnpoint prefix was ignored in swagger and redoc site backends.
  • Better logging.

item.title: foliantcontrib.superlinks 1.0.8
item.description:
• Fix: proper relative path generation for links.
  • Fix: multiple issues when !path modifier is used in the link tag.
  • BOF anchors now won't be added for mkdocs backend.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pandoc 1.1.0
item.description: • Option to build separate chapters (sections) into separate files.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.14
item.description: • Add code blocks processing for Confluence preprocessor.

item.title: foliantcontrib.graphviz 1.1.4
item.description: • Fix: issue with MkDocs: raw svgs are now wrapped in div tag.

item.title: foliantcontrib.superlinks 1.0.7
item.description:
• If tag body it empty, superlinks will try to guess the right caption of the link:
    • referenced title for links by title,
    • meta section title for links by meta section,
    • heading title for links by CustomIDs,
    • title from config or first heading title in the file for links to file,
    • anchor name for links by anchors.

item.title: foliantcontrib.apilinks 1.2.1
item.description:
• Renamed to because it may also be a path to local file,
  • Improved swagger.json parsing
  • Added Redoc support ( site backend)

item.title: foliantcontrib.apilinks 1.2.0
item.description:
• Added Swagger UI support,
  • Anchors are now generated properly, with header_anchors tool. Added optional param to determine for which backend the anchors should be generated.

item.title: foliantcontrib.archeme 1.0.3
item.description: • Add option.

item.title: foliantcontrib.reindexer 1.0.1
item.description:
• Add the option.
  • Fix web application example: mention the field, not only , in the query filter settings.

item.title: foliantcontrib.superlinks 1.0.6
item.description: • Improved Confluence links: if section is not uploaded to Confluence, reference to overall project (if it is uploaded to Confluence).

item.title: foliantcontrib.superlinks 1.0.5
item.description:
• New: added Confluence backend support.
  • Fix: links were corrupted when customids were used.
  • Fix: several other bug fixes and optimizations.

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.preprocessor_ext 1.0.4
item.description: • Add param to both functions which allows to buffer results and save all changed files at once after processing.

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.header_anchors 1.0.2
item.description: • Use pymdownx uslugify instead of default Python-Markdown slugify for MkDocs.

item.title: foliantcontrib.swaggerdoc 1.2.3
item.description: • Fix: build failed when spec referenced to other files with $ref.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.13
item.description: • Fix: cache dir for preprocessor was not created

item.title: foliantcontrib.dbdoc 0.1.4
item.description: • New: Added support for MySQL

item.title: foliantcontrib.dbdoc 0.1.3
item.description: • New: Added support for Microsoft SQL Server

item.title: foliantcontrib.escapecode 1.0.4
item.description: • Addition to normalization: remove BOM.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.13
item.description: • When getting the included content by URL, take into account the parameter of the response header field.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.12
item.description:
• Add the and attributes to mark up the included content as fence code block or inline code.
  • Prevent to create cache directory when it’s not needed. Improve code style. Refactor a little.

item.title: foliant 1.0.12
item.description:
• Add the option. Remove warning when is not set.
  • Support the YAML tag to use environment variables in the project config.
  • Allow to specify custom directory to store logs with the command line option.
  • Flush output to STDOUT in progress status messages and in the method.
  • Get and log the names and versions of all installed Foliant-related packages.
  • Do not raise exception of the same type that is raised by a preprocessor, raise instead because some exceptions take more arguments than one.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pandoc 1.0.11
item.description: • Do not re-raise an exception of the same type as raised, raise instead, it’s needed to avoid non-informative error messages.

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.12
item.description: • Do not re-raise an exception of the same type as raised, raise instead, it’s needed to avoid non-informative error messages.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multiproject 1.0.14
item.description: • Support Foliant Core 1.0.12, write logs to the directory that is specified for the multiproject.

item.title: foliantcontrib.escapecode 1.0.3
item.description: • Do not fail the preprocessor if saved code is not found, show warning message instead.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.12
item.description:
• New: option to store passwords in passfile.
  • New: nohead option to crop first title from the page.
  • Fix: better error reporting after updated atlassian-python-api package.
  • New: if you specified only param in metadata and no , section heading will be used as title.
  • Fix: if hierarchy is created on the test run, missing parents by title are now ignored

item.title: foliantcontrib.multilinetables 1.2.3
item.description: • Problem with strings containing only hyphens fixed (critical for narrow columns with lists in grid tables).

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.11
item.description:
• Add the config parameter to process file types different from .
  • Add the attribute to include content that is available by HTTP(S) URL.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.11
item.description: • Fix: XML error in code block conversion.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.3.1
item.description: • Now it's possible to use one image in several test-cases and process it correctly with move_imgs_from_text parameter.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.3.0
item.description:
• New parameter:
    • move_imgs_from_text — converts image links in test cases to ordinary markdown-links, and adds all links to params variable to use in jinja template.
  • Some readme.md bugs fixed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.flatten 1.0.7
item.description: • Fix: bug in rewrite local links regex.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.2.2
item.description: • Processing of several images in one case-step fixed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.dbdoc 0.1.2
item.description: • Fix: schema filter in Oracle functions query

item.title: foliantcontrib.swaggerdoc 1.2.2
item.description:
• Fix spec path issue.
  • Fix: jinja mode default template wansn't copied.

item.title: foliantcontrib.dbdoc 0.1.1
item.description:
• New: Add views query to components
  • Fix: Oracle triggers query
  • Fix: Fix both PostgreSQL and Oracle templates

item.title: foliantcontrib.dbmldoc 0.2.4
item.description:
• Pydbml parser version updated to 0.3.2
  • Updated templates

item.title: foliantcontrib.pgsqldoc 1.1.6
item.description: • Preprocessor is now deprecated. Please, use DBDoc instead: https://github.com/foliant-docs/foliantcontrib.dbdoc

item.title: foliantcontrib.dbdoc 0.1.0
item.description: • Initial release

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.2.1
item.description: • Bug with copying nonexistent folder to source fixed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindfigma 1.0.3
item.description: • Fix bug in caching.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindfigma 1.0.2
item.description: • Add option. Add source Markdown file path to the messages written to STDOUT.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.2.0
item.description:
• Downloading of images from test cases implemented.
  • New parameter:
    • img_folder – folder name to store downloaded images.
  • Renamed parameters:
    • rewrite_src_file -> rewrite_src_files,
    • screenshots_ext -> img_ext.
  • Paths processing fixed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.templateparser 1.0.4
item.description:
• All variables, supplied in context, are also available inside the variable
  • You can now supply a link to file on remote server in the parameter.
  • External context yaml-file now may be not a dictionary. In this case it will be available under the template variable.

item.title: foliantcontrib.superlinks 1.0.4
item.description: • Fix: bug with chapters.

item.title: foliantcontrib.dbmldoc 0.2.2
item.description:
• Pydbml parser version updated to 0.3.2
  • Updated templates

item.title: foliantcontrib.archeme 1.0.2
item.description: • Fix the same bug in stronger way.

item.title: foliantcontrib.archeme 1.0.1
item.description: • Fix very strange bug with modules cache.

item.title: foliantcontrib.dbmldoc 0.1
item.description: • Initial release

item.title: foliantcontrib.multiproject 1.0.13
item.description: • Keep temporary directories of built subprojects. It is needed when local includes that rewrite image paths are used.

item.title: foliantcontrib.elasticsearch 1.0.4
item.description: • Add action.

item.title: foliantcontrib.replace 1.0.4
item.description: • Replace in links and images fixed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.alt_structure 0.2.0
item.description:
• Preprocessor now doesn't read config file, which previously caused MultiProject to run second time.
  • Registry is now flat dictionary.
  • Structure is now supplied via dictionary.

item.title: foliantcontrib.showcommits 1.0.2
item.description: • Add and options.

item.title: foliantcontrib.elasticsearch 1.0.3
item.description: • Add option.

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.3.2
item.description:
• Cutomids are now cut out from titles.
  • Added logging.
  • Meta commands now support and arguments.
  • command now gives some verbose output after work.
  • Fix: get_section_by_offset didn't count YFM.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.10
item.description: • Disabled tabbed code blocks conversion because of conflicts.

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.preprocessor_ext 1.0.3
item.description: • Add method for preprocessors without tags.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testcoverage 0.1.1
item.description: • Support meta 1.3.0

item.title: foliantcontrib.testcoverage 0.1.0
item.description: • Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.metagraph 0.1.2
item.description: • Metadata is now taken from src_dir to minimize possible conflicts with other preprocessors.

item.title: foliantcontrib.metagraph 0.1.1
item.description: • New parameter: , which controls which sections are included.

item.title: foliantcontrib.metagraph 0.1.0
item.description: • Initial release

item.title: foliantcontrib.templateparser 1.0.3
item.description:
• Now meta dictionary is available inside templates under variable.
  • Project's meta object is available inside templates under variable.

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.3.1
item.description:
• now also trims whitespaces in the beginning of the file after removing YFM
  • Main section's title is now set to first heading, if:
    • the first heading is a 1-level heading (#),
    • the first heading doesn't have meta.
  • Fix: YFM was not included in meta in some cases

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.8
item.description: • Now foliant-anchors are always added even for new pages

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.9
item.description:
• Introducing import from confluence into Foliant with tag
  • Fix: solved conflicts between inline comments and macros (including anchors)
  • Fix: backend crashed if new page content was empty
  • Markdown code blocks are now converted into code-block macros
  • Markdown task lists are now converted into task-list macros
  • New option

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.combined_options 1.0.10
item.description:
• Fix: default dict was overriden after the first use.
  • Allow to supply the list of priorities instead of just one priority.
  • Priority for those option dictionaries, which are not mentioned in the param, are now defined by the order dictionaries are defined.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.11
item.description: • Misprint fixed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.10
item.description: • Bug with template handling fixed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.7
item.description: • Fix another conflict with escapecode

item.title: foliantcontrib.graphviz 1.1.3
item.description: • Fix: as_image takes effect only with format.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindfigma 1.0.1
item.description:
• Add and options.
  • Output error messages to STDOUT.
  • Minor improvements.

item.title: foliantcontrib.alt_structure 0.1.2
item.description: • Fix: Remove config check from init

item.title: foliantcontrib.alt_structure 0.1.1
item.description: • Initial release

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.combined_options 1.0.9
item.description:
• defaults now actually supply default value (before they were only used for validation)
  • add None to possible type validation in .

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.11
item.description: • Get captions for pages from workingdir instead of src_dir

item.title: foliantcontrib.slate 1.0.8
item.description: • Support meta 1.3

item.title: foliantcontrib.superlinks 1.0.3
item.description: • Support meta 1.3.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.9
item.description: • Support meta 1.3.

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.3.0
item.description: • Restructure modules to aid import errors. Meta-related functions and classes are now available independantly from package.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.6
item.description:
• Support meta 1.3
  • Now foliant-anchors are always added around uploaded content
  • Anchors are now case insensitive

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.2.3
item.description:
• Add method to Meta class.
  • Add Developer's guide to readme.

item.title: foliantcontrib.elasticsearch 1.0.2
item.description: • Add option. Use only for .

item.title: foliantcontrib.elasticsearch 1.0.1
item.description: • Add option. Perform actions , by default. Fix HTML markup in Web application example.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.5
item.description: • Fix: build crashed when several resolved inline comments referred to same string

item.title: foliantcontrib.superlinks 1.0.2
item.description:
• add dependencies order check.
  • rename anchor parameter to id.
  • add anchor parameter for possibly global anchor search.
  • link to anchors in Confluence are now partly supported.

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.header_anchors 1.0.1
item.description: • Add function to determine flat backends.

item.title: foliantcontrib.anchors 1.0.4
item.description: • Applied anchors are now checked from all chapters for flat backends.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.9
item.description: • Function to get case data by id added.

item.title: foliantcontrib.superlinks 1.0.1
item.description: • Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.header_anchors 1.0.0
item.description: • Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.anchors 1.0.3
item.description:
• Better regex patterns.
  • Conflicts are now determined for each backend separately.
  • Add confluence anchors.

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.2.2
item.description:
• Don't require empty line between heading and meta tag.
  • Allow comments in YFM.
  • Better patterns for sections detection.

item.title: foliantcontrib.showcommits 1.0.1
item.description: • Fix template processing. Log repo path.

item.title: foliantcontrib.flatten 1.0.6
item.description: • Rewrite local links (e.g. → ).

item.title: foliantcontrib.slate 1.0.7
item.description:
• Fix: images are preserved in the output, even from subfolders.
  • YAML Front Matter from the sources is now ignored.

item.title: foliantcontrib.init 1.0.8
item.description:
• Add comment to Dockerfile with option to use Foliant full image.
  • Remove slugs from docker-compose. Now the service is always named .

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.2.1
item.description: • Fix bug with imports.

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.2.0
item.description:
• Support sections
  • meta.yml format restructure

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.4
item.description: • Support meta 1.2. Now you can publish sections to confluence.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.8
item.description: • Support meta 1.2.

item.title: foliantcontrib.imgcaptions 1.0.2
item.description:
• Fix: only worked with the modifier.
  • Add the parameter to customize the caption HTML tag.

item.title: foliantcontrib.mdtopdf 1.0.0
item.description: • Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.ramldoc 1.0.1
item.description: • Initial release

item.title: foliantcontrib.aglio 1.0.0
item.description: • Initial release

item.title: foliantcontrib.slate 1.0.6
item.description: • Fix bug with error catching introduced in 1.0.5

item.title: foliantcontrib.slate 1.0.5
item.description:
• Better error reporting.
  • Fixes for working with includes.

item.title: foliantcontrib.escapecode 1.0.2
item.description: • Improve flexibility: add new actions, allow to override defaults.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multiproject 1.0.12
item.description: • Take into account the flag. Require Foliant 1.0.11 for this reason.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.7
item.description: • Allow to specify custom options for EscapeCode preprocessor as the config parameter value.

item.title: foliant 1.0.11
item.description:
• Allow to specify custom options for EscapeCode preprocessor as the config parameter value.
  • Pass the flag to as an optional argument for using in config extensions.

item.title: foliantcontrib.subset 1.0.9
item.description: • Fix incompatibilities with newer versions of modules: Cliar, PyYAML.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multiproject 1.0.11
item.description:
• Allow recursive processing of nested subprojects.
  • Allow to specify type (HTML/Markdown) and location for repo links.
  • Fix incompatibility with new Cliar: key names should not contain hyphens.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.3
item.description: • Remove resolved inline comments as they mix up with unresolved.

item.title: foliantcontrib.mermaid 1.0.1
item.description: • Better error reporting

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.combined_options 1.0.8
item.description: • Fix validator.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.2
item.description:
• Added parameter.
  • Fix: images were not uploaded for new pages.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multiproject 1.0.10
item.description: • Allow the first heading to be located not in the beginning of a document.

item.title: foliantcontrib.flatten 1.0.5
item.description: • Add the option to keep original files in the temporary working directory after flattening.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.6.0
item.description:
• Now content is put in place of anchor or instead of ... anchors on the target page. If no anchors on page — content replaces the whole body.
  • New modes (backwards compatibility is broken!).
  • Now following files are available for debug in cache dir: 1. markdown before conversion to html. 2. Converted to HTML. 3. Final XHTML source which is uploaded to confluence.
  • Working (but far from perfect) detection if file was changed.
  • Only upload changed attachments.
  • Updating attachments instead of deleting and uploading again.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.5.2
item.description:
• Completely rewrite restoring inline comments feature.
  • Add and emergency options.
  • Allow insert raw confluence code (macros, etc) inside tag.

item.title: foliantcontrib.history 1.0.8
item.description: • Allow to ignore merge commits in mode.

item.title: foliantcontrib.history 1.0.7
item.description: • Allow to get repo names from README files.

item.title: foliantcontrib.history 1.0.6
item.description: • Fix some regex patterns.

item.title: foliantcontrib.history 1.0.5
item.description: • Allow to generate history based on tags and commits.

item.title: foliantcontrib.history 1.0.4
item.description: • Add templates for target Markdown headings and RSS items titles.

item.title: foliantcontrib.history 1.0.3
item.description: • Escape regex metacharacters in headings.

item.title: foliantcontrib.epsconvert 1.0.7
item.description: • Fix image reference detection pattern, other minor fixes.

item.title: foliantcontrib.history 1.0.2
item.description: • Do not generate common top-level heading of target Markdown content.

item.title: foliantcontrib.history 1.0.1
item.description: • Add RSS feed generation.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.6
item.description: • Escape regular expression metacharacters in starting and ending headings, IDs, modifiers.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.5
item.description: • Remove meta blocks from the included content.

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.10
item.description: • Fix pattern for heading detection.

item.title: foliantcontrib.swaggerdoc 1.2.0
item.description:
• Add and parameters.
  • All path tag parameters are now loaded relative to current file.
  • Better logging and error reporting

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.combined_options 1.0.7
item.description:
• Add validator.
  • Add .

item.title: foliantcontrib.customids 1.0.6
item.description: • Allow to define custom styles for headings of each level.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.4.1
item.description: • Fix: conflict with escape_code

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.4
item.description: • Allow for the starting and ending headings to be 1-character long.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.4.0
item.description:
• Fix: attachments were not uploaded for nonexistent pages
  • Change confluence api wrapper to atlassian-python-api
  • Rename backend to confluence
  • Better error reporting

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.9
item.description: • Allow the first heading to be located not in the beginning of a document.

item.title: foliantcontrib.epsconvert 1.0.6
item.description: • Bug fix: update current directory path before processing of Markdown file content, not after.

item.title: foliantcontrib.imagemagick 1.0.2
item.description: • Bug fix: update current directory path before processing of Markdown file content, not after.

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.1.0
item.description:
• Remove the sections entity.
  • Restructure code.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.3.0
item.description:
• Fix bug with images.
  • Add multiple modes and mode parameter.
  • Add toc parameter to automatically insert toc.
  • Fix: upload attachments before text update (this caused images to disappear after manually editing).

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.0.3
item.description: • Add span to meta

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.2.0
item.description:
• Allow to input login and/or password during build
  • Added option
  • Better logging and error catching

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.combined_options 1.0.6
item.description:
• Add check for required params.
  • Add val_type validator to check for param types.
  • Allow to set values in Options objects

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.1.0
item.description: • Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.3
item.description: • Allow to specify IDs of anchors in the and attributes. Support the attribute.

item.title: foliantcontrib.escapecode 1.0.1
item.description: • Do not ignore diagram definitions. It should be possible to escape the tags used by diagram drawing preprocessors. If some preprocessors need to work with the content that is recognized as code, call UnescapeCode explicitly before them.

item.title: foliantcontrib.replace 1.0.3
item.description: • Fixed issue with PyYAML deprecated loader.

item.title: foliantcontrib.mermaid 1.0.0
item.description: • Initial release

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.2
item.description: • Fix include statement regex pattern. Tags joined with must be in non-capturing parentheses.

item.title: foliant 1.0.10
item.description: • Add config option. To use it, escapecode and unescapecode preprocessors must be installed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.1
item.description:
• Support config option. Require Foliant 1.0.10 and escapecode preprocessor 1.0.0.
  • Process recursively.

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.preprocessor_ext 1.0.2
item.description:
• Fix output
  • Remove get_options overriding, it's now implemented similarly in core

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.14
item.description:
• Add attribute to tag.
  • Refactor a little.

item.title: foliantcontrib.slugs 1.0.1
item.description: • Add and YAML tags.

item.title: foliantcontrib.docus 0.2.0
item.description: • More flexible chapters parsing. Lists are now not mandatory.

item.title: foliantcontrib.docus 0.1.0
item.description: • Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.runcommands 1.0.1
item.description: • Capture the output of an external command and write it to STDOUT.

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.0.2
item.description:
• Fix: subsections title may be specified in YFM;
  • Fix: in subsections title was being cropped out

item.title: foliantcontrib.project_graph 1.0.1
item.description:
• Rename rel attributes: to , to
  • Relation types now don't implicitly go to edge labels. Add label explicitly from now on.
  • Fixed: relations to !project_path and !rel_path didn't work.

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.0.1
item.description:
• Fix: seeds for main sections were not processed.
  • Add debug messages for seeds processing.

item.title: foliantcontrib.project_graph 1.0.0
item.description: Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.0.0
item.description: Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.0
item.description:
• Support Foliant 1.0.9. Add processing of , , and modifiers (i.e. YAML tags) in attribute values of pseudo-XML tags inside the included content. Replace the values that preceded by these modifiers with absolute paths resolved depending on current context.
  • Allow to specify the top-level (“root”) directory of Foliant project that the included file belongs to, with optional attribute of the tag. This can be necessary to resolve the and the modifiers in the included content correctly.
  • Allow to specify all necessary parameters of each include statement as attribute values of pseudo-XML tags. Keep legacy syntax for backward compatibility.
  • Update README.

item.title: foliant 1.0.9
item.description:
• Process attribute values of pseudo-XML tags as YAML.
  • Allow single quotes for enclosing attribute values of pseudo-XML tags.
  • Add and YAML tags.

item.description: • Support PyYAML 5.1

item.description: • support PyYAML 5.1

item.description: • support PyYAML 5.1

item.description:
• Fix issues with json and yaml. All spec files are now loaded with yaml loader.
  • Change PyYAML to ruamel.yaml
  • jinja mode is deprecated, widdershins is the default mode

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.8
item.description: • Escape control characters (double quotation marks, dollar signs, backticks) that may be used in system shell commands.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pandoc 1.0.10
item.description: • Add backticks to the set of characters that should be escaped.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pandoc 1.0.9
item.description: • Escape double quotation marks () and dollar signs () which may be used in PDF, docx, and TeX generation commands as parts of filenames, variable values, etc. Enclose filenames that may be used in commands into double quotes.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.11
item.description: • Take into account the results of work of preprocessors that may be applied before includes within a single Foliant project. Rewrite the currently processed Markdown file path with the path of corresponding file that is located inside the project source directory only if the currently processed Markdown file is located inside the temporary working directory and the included file is located outside the temporary working directory. Keep all paths unchanged in all other cases.

item.title: foliantcontrib.graphviz 1.0.6
item.description: • Added as_image option.

item.title: foliantcontrib.anchors 1.0.5
item.description:
• Anchor headings conflicts are now more accurate, because for flat backends are checked for all chapters.
  • Anchors with illegal characters (list in readme) now will be removed.
  • Preprocessor now can also work with custom ids.

item.title: foliantcontrib.apilinks 1.1.0
item.description:
• Prefixes are now case insensitive.
  • Only prefixes which are defined are trimmed.
  • New option to ignore all prefixes which are not listed in config.
  • Options renamed and regrouped. Breaks backward compatibility.
  • Support of several reference pattern and properties (to catch models).
  • Now search on API page for headers h1, h2, h3 and h4.

item.description: • Remove forgotten unnecessary import.

• Jinja templates updated.
  • Bug with multi-select parameter processing fixed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.2
item.description: • Now it's possible to use dropdown type parameters for test cases samplings.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.1
item.description: • Readme updated.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.0
item.description:
• Removed parameters:
    • platforms,
    • platform_id,
    • add_cases_without_platform,
    • add_unpublished_cases.
  • Added parameters:
    • exclude_suite_ids — to exclude suites from final document by ID,
    • exclude_section_ids — to exclude sections from final document by ID,
    • exclude_case_ids — to exclude cases from final document by ID,
    • add_case_id_to_std_table - to add column with case ID to the testing table,
    • multi_param_name - name of custom TestRail multi-select parameter for cases sampling,
    • multi_param_select - values of multi-select parameter for cases sampling,
    • multi_param_select_type — sampling method,
    • add_cases_without_multi_param - to add cases without any value of multi-select parameter,
    • add_multi_param_to_case_header — to add values of multi-select parameter to the case headers,
    • add_multi_param_to_std_table — to add column with values of multi-select parameter to the testing table,
    • checkbox_param_name - name of custom TestRail checkbox parameter for cases sampling,
    • checkbox_param_select_type — state of custom TestRail checkbox parameter for cases sampling,
    • choose_priorities — selection of case priorities for cases sampling,
    • add_priority_to_case_header - to add priority to the case header,
    • add_priority_to_std_table — to add column with priority to the testing table.
  • Renamed parameters:
    • add_case_id_to_case_name -> add_case_id_to_case_header.
  • Fixed config parsing.

item.description:
• Add tests; refactor code

item.description: • Provide customizable default names for untitled nested groups of chapters.

item.title: foliantcontrib.flatten 1.0.4
item.description: • Skip empty headings of nested subsections.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.8
item.description:
• Require at least one space after hashes in the beginning of each heading.
  • Add option to the tag.
  • Fix the bug: do not ignore empty lines after headings when using .
  • Fix the bug: allow to use less than 3 characters in the heading content.
  • Do not mark as headings the strings that contain more than 6 leading hashes. If shifted heading level is more than 6, mark the heading content as bold paragraph text, not as heading.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multiproject 1.0.5
item.description: • Provide Git submodules support.

item.title: foliantcontrib.flatten 1.0.3
item.description:

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.7

  • Allow revision markers in repo aliases.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.6
item.description:

  • Fix top heading level calculation.

item.description: • Provide compatibility with Foliant 1.0.5. Allow to use multiple config files.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pandoc 1.0.6

  • Require Foliant 1.0.4.

item.title: foliant 1.0.4
item.description:
• Breaking change. Add logging to all stages of building a project. Config parser extensions, CLI extensions, backends, and preprocessors can now access and create child loggers with .
  • Add backend with target that applies the preprocessors from the config and returns a Foliant project that doesn't require any preprocessing.
  • now returns its result, which makes is easier to call it from extensions.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.4
item.description: • Describe the preprocessor usage in .

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.3
item.description: • Eliminate external Perl scripts, rewrite the preprocessor code in Python.

item.description: • Fix critical issue when config parsing would fail if any config value contained non-latin characters.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.4
item.description: • Fix the pattern for headings detection.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.3
item.description: • Allow hashes ( characters) in the content of headings.

item.description: • Take into account the content of image file when computing MD5 hash.

item.description: • Change the path for non-Python scripts.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.2
item.description: • Fix inappropriate translation of image URLs into local paths.

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.2
item.description:
• Add and options for MkDocs backend.
  • Fix inappropriate translation of image URLs into local paths in MkDocs preprocessor.

item.title: foliant 1.0.2
item.description: • Use README.md as package description.

item.title: foliantcontrib.epsconvert 1.0.1
item.description: • Add option support.

item.title: foliant 1.0.1
item.description: • Fix critical bug with CLI module caused by missing version definition in the root file.

item.title: foliant 1.0.0
item.description: • Complete rewrite.

item.title: foliantcontrib.blockdiag 1.0.1
item.description: • Add output format support.

item.title: foliantcontrib.init 1.0.3
item.description:
• Upon creation, relative path to the created project directory is returned instead of an absolute one.
  • Templates: basic: Foliant docs related content removed from README.md.
  • Templates: basic: added to requirements.txt.

item.title: foliantcontrib.init 1.0.2
item.description:
• Add placeholder.
  • Process placeholders in , , and files, not just .
  • Templates: basic: Add , , , and .

item.title: foliantcontrib.init 1.0.1
item.description:
• Fix issue with command missing after installation.
  • Fix issue with missing templates after installation.

item.title: foliantcontrib.macros 1.0.3
item.description: • Add tag .

item.title: foliantcontrib.macros 1.0.2
item.description:
• Switch from unnamed to named parameters.
  • Macro name is now defined in the tag body instead of "name" option.

item.title: foliantcontrib.macros 1.0.1
item.description: • Preserve param case.

item.title: foliantcontrib.flags 1.0.1
item.description: • Add and options to tag.
